title: PancakeSwap’s Chinese X Account Hacked to Push Scam Coin, Native Token Defies Drop
contentSnippet: The price of PancakeSwap's native token remains mostly unaffected as experts blame the attack on phishing and weak security.

title: A ‘spooky’ Ethereum correlation suggests an imminent breakout
contentSnippet: Ethereum is moving in tandem with small-cap stocks, and analysts say both assets could rise together with four potential Fed rate cuts ahead.

title: XRP Crash Brewing? Prices Continue to Print 'Lower Highs' Alongside New Highs in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The pattern makes XRP vulnerable to sharp downside volatility.

title: Crypto stocks IREN, NAKA struggle amid convertible note deals
contentSnippet: IREN and Kindly MD are raising big money through convertible notes, but traders reacted negatively following each of the companies’ multimillion-dollar deals.

title: 「ビットコインは金に比べ著しく過小評価」ライトスパークCEO語る
contentSnippet: ライトスパークCEOのデービッド・マーカス氏が、ビットコインは金と比較して著しく過小評価されており、金と同等の価値なら1BTC=130万ドルに達すると主張した。金価格が史上最高値の4000ドルを突破する中、JPモルガンもビットコインが過小評価されていると指摘し、16.5万ドルの価格予測を発表している。

title: CleanCore Solutions adds over 710M Dogecoin to treasury
contentSnippet: CleanCore Solutions says it wants to scale its treasury “responsibly with transparency and resilience” as it aims to accumulate 1 billion Dogecoin tokens.

title: Kazakhstan Tightens Crypto Rules After Seizing $16.7M From Unlicensed Exchanges
contentSnippet: The country's plans represent "one of the boldest experiments in tying physical identity to financial transparency," Decrypt was told.

title: Major US labor union says Senate crypto bill lacks ‘meaningful safeguards’
contentSnippet: The AFL-CIO says the Senate’s crypto framework bill “provides the facade of regulation” that would expose workers’ retirement funds to risky assets.

title: Dogecoin Plunges 8% Before Whale Buying Stabilizes at DOGE Prices $0.25
contentSnippet: Institutional interest remains with ETF filings, while mining investments signal long-term confidence in DOGE.

title: トランプミームコイン発行企業、2億ドル調達でトレジャリー企業設立へ＝報道
contentSnippet: TRUMPミームコイン発行企業が最低2億ドルの資金調達を計画中とブルームバーグが報道。低迷するトークン蓄積のためデジタル資産トレジャリー企業設立を目指す。

title: Gold Skyrockets Past $4K, Bitcoin Looks South as Dollar Index Hits 2-Month
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and gold have diverged over the past 24 hours amid a strengthening dollar index.

title: 米金融大手BNYメロン、トークン化預金を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: BNYメロンがトークン化預金の導入検討をブルームバーグが報道。1日2.5兆ドルの決済を処理する同行がブロックチェーン活用でインフラ近代化を推進。

title: Bitcoin’s Short-Term Whales Now Hold $10.1B in Paper Gains. Is a Cash Out Next?
contentSnippet: Exchange inflow data already showed $5.7 billion moving from STH wallets into exchanges earlier this week, marking an early sign that profit-taking is not a theoretical risk, but an active one.

title: Why Altcoins Are Dragging Their Feet as Bitcoin, Ethereum Soar
contentSnippet: Experts say altcoins lag as capital favors Bitcoin and Ethereum's liquidity, with any future rally being highly selective toward utility.

title: XRP Drops to $2.90 Support as Bullish Crypto Bets Rack up $500M Liquidations
contentSnippet: Traders are watching if XRP can hold the $2.85–$2.87 support band amid broader market pressures.

title: SEC to Formalize Crypto 'Innovation' Exemptions: Here's Why That Matters
contentSnippet: The regulator is developing a framework that could let crypto projects experiment under supervision instead of facing enforcement.

title: 「仮想通貨への投資は今でも遅すぎない」パンテラ幹部が見解
contentSnippet: パンテラキャピタルのゼネラルパートナーがビットコイン、イーサリアム、ソラナなど仮想通貨投資の将来性を語った。ファンドマネージャーの多くが投資しておらず拡大余地ありとする。

title: Canary’s Litecoin, HBAR ETFs ready for ‘go-time’ after gov shutdown: Analysts
contentSnippet: ETF analyst Eric Balchunas says Canary Capital’s filings for spot Litecoin and HBAR funds are seemingly finalized, but the government shutdown will delay their launch.

title: クリーンコア、ドージコイン保有量7.1億DOGE到達　含み益30億円超に
contentSnippet: 米NYSE上場のクリーンコアソリューションズが公式ドージコイン・トレジャリーの保有量7.1億DOGE突破を発表。10億枚目標に向けビットスタンプ提携で取得継続中。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Singapore Authorities Say Token2049 Organizer Not Covered by Russia Sanctions After A7A5 Appearance
contentSnippet: Monetary Authority of Singapore spokesperson tells CoinDesk that entities not regulated as financial institutions are not subject to sanctions measures.

title: 米SEC、仮想通貨企業向け「イノベーション免除」制度を年内にも正式化へ
contentSnippet: SECのアトキンス委員長が8日、仮想通貨企業向けの「イノベーション免除」制度を年内か2026年第1四半期に正式化する意向を示した。政府閉鎖が規則制定の進展を妨げている。

title: Strategy’s $78B Bitcoin nears Amazon’s 2nd-largest corporate treasury
contentSnippet: Strategy’s $78 billion stash of Bitcoin is close to the cash positions held by Amazon, Google and Microsoft, the last of which rejected Bitcoin as a treasury asset last year.

title: トレジャリー企業とETFのイーサリアム保有量、供給の10％以上に到達
contentSnippet: 企業とETFによる仮想通貨イーサリアムの保有額が供給の10%を突破した。ビットマインやシャープリンクが大量蓄積を続ける一方、過熱へ注意を呼びかける論者も。最新動向を解説する。

title: ‘Hundreds of simulations’ pin Bitcoin at 50% odds of $140K this month
contentSnippet: Based on Bitcoin’s price at the start of October, a $140,000 price tag by the end of the month is consistent with its average gains in October over the years.

title: Crypto’s Retail Era Is Over: Institutions Now Set the Market’s Pace, Experts Say
contentSnippet: Executives from Bitwise and Aspen Digital say long-term institutional capital now drives crypto as ETFs and wealth managers bring stability.

title: ビットコイン史上最高値圏で急落、デリバティブ市場は強気継続を示唆｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは7〜8日にかけて、史上最高値付近まで上昇したのち急落するという激しい値動きを見せた。最高値圏では流動性が極めて薄く、ボラティリティが急拡大しやすい局面にある。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: シャープリンク、イーサリアム戦略で含み益9億ドル超
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のシャープリンクが7日、イーサリアム・トレジャリー戦略開始以来の未実現利益が9億ドルを超えたと発表した。ライバルのビットマインは総保有額134億ドルに達している。

title: Bitcoin Cools but Analysts Remain Upbeat. Why?
contentSnippet: One observer said that BTC could surpass $140,000 by year's end.

title: Solana’s $2.85B revenue outpaces Ethereum’s early growth: 21Shares
contentSnippet: Solana pulled in $2.85 billion in annual revenue across DeFi, AI and trading apps, as institutions pushed the network toward mainstream finance.

title: ETH rally tops out at $4.8K, setting up a make-or-break moment for Ether bulls
contentSnippet: Ether’s short-term correction may set the stage for a larger upside move as ETH’s liquidity metrics turn increasingly favorable.

title: 予測大手ポリマーケット、Bakktの親会社ICEから3000億円の戦略的出資を獲得
contentSnippet: 大手予測市場ポリマーケットはニューヨーク証券取引所の親会社ICEから20億ドルの戦略的投資を獲得したと発表した。同日ビットコイン入金機能も開始した。

title: Uptober in Full Swing as Crypto Market Tops $4.3 Trillion: Here's What to Expect
contentSnippet: The crypto market hit an all-time high this week as Bitcoin again shattered records. But can bulls sustain the momentum throughout the entire month of Uptober?

title: SEC Aiming to Formalize 'Innovation Exemption' by End of Year, Chair Atkins Says
contentSnippet: While the government shutdown is slowing the SEC's work, Atkins said he still intends to initiate formal rulemaking by the end of 2025 or beginning of 2026.

title: BNB 'Meme Season' Arrives as Binance and CZ-Inspired Coins Get Hot
contentSnippet: BNB keeps soaring to new heights, and now meme coins inspired by Binance and Changpeng "CZ" Zhao are popping harder than Solana tokens.

title: IREN Declines 6% on $875M Convertible Note Offering
contentSnippet: The hot-handed bitcoin miner turned high-performance computing play could raise as much as $1 billion in the note sale.

title: The 5 Largest Publicly Traded Solana Treasury Firms
contentSnippet: Institutions are gobbling up Solana for their balance sheets, collectively adding billions in SOL. These are the top publicly traded treasuries.

title: BNB Continues Historic Surge as Nasdaq-Listed Firm Reveals $611 Million Treasury
contentSnippet: CEA Industries shares are up 8% on the day after the company revealed a stockpile of 480,000 BNB—right as the coin keeps hitting new highs.

title: CleanCore's Dogecoin Treasury Tops 710M Tokens, Booking $20M+ Gain
contentSnippet: The company has been acquiring DOGE since early September using proceeds from a $175 million private placement.

title: Bitcoin Dips to $122K as Crypto Rally Gets Overheated. What Next?
contentSnippet: The pullback was a broad one, with altcoins like SOL, ADA, and XRP suffering even steeper declines.
